summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of Fifth Avenue North from Prospect Street to a point one hundred twenty (120) feet, South of Galer Street in the City of Seattle, by constructing sewer under Ordinance No. 13508, creating Local Improvement District No. 1238 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
